author: K Srinivasa Rao
text:
The Andhra Pradesh History Congress on Friday asked the Telangana government to hand over all documents, manuscripts and important historical books to Andhra Pradesh to enable it to preserve the rich history of the State.

It said future generations need to know the historical background of Andhra Pradesh. The association will hold its 40th meeting on Saturday and Sunday here. As many as 200 delegates from all over of the country will chalk out an action plan to preserve the history of Andhra Pradesh.

Founder-member of the Andhra Pradesh History Congress Vakulabharanam Ramakrishna expressed concern over the inordinate delay by the Telangana government in handing over historical monuments and other details to A.P. ICHR will organise a book exhibition as part of the two-day event.
title: A.P. to Telangana: return historical documents
